filesystem package¶

filesystem.fat module¶

class filesystem.fat.FAT(fstype='fat32', stream=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for FAT filesystem.

Parameters:
  • fstype (String) – Chooses filesystem type
  • stream (Disk) – Stream for writing
class filesystem.fat.FAT_Boot(offset=0)[source]¶

Bases: ruamel.yaml.main.YAML

Initializes fat boot sector.

Parameters:offset (int) – Offset on disk
initBoot(size, chJumpInstruction='\xebX\x90', chOemId='Test', wBytesPerSector=512, uchSectorsPerCluster=32, wRsvdSectorsCount=1, uchFatCopies=2, wMaxRootEntries=0, wTotalSectors=0, uchMediaDescriptor=248, wSectorsPerFat=0, wSectorsPerTrack=63, wHeads=16, wHiddenSectors=0, dwTotalLogicalSectors=0)[source]¶

Sets boot sector parameters.

Parameters:
  • size (int) – disk size in bytes
  • chJumpInstruction (Hex-String) – Jump instruction code
  • chOemId (String) – OEM Name
  • wBytesPerSector (int) – Bytes per sector (default: 512)
  • uchSectorsPerCluster (int) – sectors per cluster
  • wRsvdSectorsCount (int) – Size in sectors of reserved area
  • uchFatCopies (int) – Number of FATs. Typically two
  • wMaxRootEntries (int) – Maximum number of files in root directory, for FAT12 and FAT16 only. Has to be 0 for FAT32
  • wTotalSectors (int) – 16-bit value of number of sectors in file system
  • uchMediaDescriptor (Hex-Value) – Media type. Typically 0xf8 for fixed disks and 0xf0 for removable disk.
  • wSectorsPerFat (int) – 16-bit size in sectors of each FAT for FAT12 and FAT16. 0 for FAT32
  • wSectorsPerTrack (int) – Sectors per track of storage device
  • wHeads (int) – Number of heads in storage device
  • wHiddenSectors (int) – Number of sectors before the start of partition
  • dwTotalLogicalSectors – 32-bit value of number of sectors in file system
Returns:

None
Return type:

None

Packs attributes to struct. Mapping of sizes is done with layout dictionary.

class filesystem.fat32.FAT32(stream=None)[source]¶

Bases: filesystem.fat.FAT

Parent class for all FAT32 operations.

Parameters:stream (Disk) – Disk stream for writing and reading
writeNew()[source]¶

Initializes new FAT filesystem in disk, including new FAT boot sector, FSInfo parameters and FATs and backup copies. Blanking root directory

Returns:0 for success, 1 for error
Return type:int

cl2offset(cluster)[source]¶

Returns the real offset of a cluster from disk start

Parameters:cluster – Number of cluster

fat(fatcopy=0)[source]¶

Returns position of given fatcopy in bytes

Parameters:fatcopy – Number of fatcopy (0: default, 1: first copy)
Returns:Position of FAT in bytes
initBoot(size, chJumpInstruction='\xebX\x90', chOemId='Test', wBytesPerSector=512, uchSectorsPerCluster=32, wRsvdSectorsCount=32, uchFatCopies=2, wMaxRootEntries=0, wTotalSectors=0, uchMediaDescriptor=248, wSectorsPerFat=0, wSectorsPerTrack=63, wHeads=16, wHiddenSectors=0, dwSectorsPerFat=0, dwRootCluster=2, wFSISector=1, wBootCopySector=6, chReserved='\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00\x00', chPhysDriveNumber=128, chReserved1=0, chExtBootSignature=41, wBootSignature=43605, dwVolumeID=1234567890, sVolumeLabel='TEST', sFSType='FAT32')[source]¶

Initializes boot sector parameters.

Parameters:
  • size (int) – disk size in bytes
  • chJumpInstruction (Hex-String) – Jump instruction code
  • chOemId (String) – OEM Name
  • wBytesPerSector (int) – Bytes per sector (default: 512)
  • uchSectorsPerCluster (int) – sectors per cluster
  • wRsvdSectorsCount (int) – Size in sectors of reserved area
  • uchFatCopies (int) – Number of FATs. Typically two
  • wMaxRootEntries (int) – Maximum number of files in root directory, for FAT12 and FAT16 only. Has to be 0 for FAT32
  • wTotalSectors (int) – 16-bit value of number of sectors in file system
  • uchMediaDescriptor (Hex-Value) – Media type. Typically 0xf8 for fixed disks and 0xf0 for removable disk.
  • wSectorsPerFat (int) – 16-bit size in sectors of each FAT for FAT12 and FAT16. 0 for FAT32
  • wSectorsPerTrack (int) – Sectors per track of storage device
  • wHeads (int) – Number of heads in storage device
  • wHiddenSectors (int) – Number of sectors before the start of partition
  • dwSectorsPerFat (int) – 32-bit size in sectors per FAT
  • dwRootCluster (int) – Root directory cluster
  • wFSISector (int) – Sector where FSINFO structure can be found
  • wBootCopySector (int) – Sector where backup copy of boot sector is located.
  • chReserved (String) – Reserved
  • chPhysDriveNumber (String) – INT13h drive number
  • chReserved1 (String) – Not used
  • chExtBootSignature (Char) – Extended boot signature to identify the next three values are valid
  • wBootSignature – boot signature
  • dwVolumeID (int) – Volume serial number
  • sVolumeLabel (String) – Volume label
  • sFSType (String) – File system type label
Returns:

None
Return type:

None

Initializes boot sector parameters from config.

  • fat32BootConfig (FAT32BootParameter) – FAT32 boot sector parameter
